name: Buddy (itch) (Kyle Kissler)
description:
Made as part of the 2018 GMTK Game Jam.

Genre: Stealth

Concept: A stealth game without subtlety.

You are Buddy's accomplice. Help them get through a guarded floor by drawing as much attention to yourself as possible.

Credits:

Daniel Schauer - Original Music

Brandon Delehoy - Sound Effects, Programming, Design, Art

Kyle Kissler - Programming, Design
